cm_tab_users.description: Label of the tab that contains all users in the channel manager

cm_add.description: Label on button that opens a dialog to add a channel or user.

cm_options.description: Label of the button to open the extension options in the channel manager

cm_title.description: Title of the channel manager tab

nonliveNotification.description: Notification when a channel changes a non-live state

copyNotification.message: Stream URL von $CHANNEL$ in die Zwischenablage kopiert
copyNotification.description: Notification content after the URL of a stream was copied from the panel context menu

cm_dialog_cancel.description: Cancel the dialog for adding a user or channel.

providerlivestream.description: Provider name for the original livestream.com

panel_tab_offline.description: Label of the tab with all offline channels in the panel

extensionDescription.message: Erhalte eine Benachrichtigung, wenn ein verfolgter Streamer live geht. Diese Erweiterung gibt dir die Kontrolle darüber, welche Kanäle geprüft werden und schnellen Zugriff auf all diese Kanäle über ein praktisches Panel.

cm_remove.description: Label of the button to remove the selected users or channels

listTooltipOffline.message: Keine Kanäle sind live im Moment
listTooltipOffline.description: Button tooltip when there are no live channels in the panel

context_copy.label.description: Context menu action to copy the URL of a channel in the panel

cm_help.description: Label of the help button in the channel manager

nonliveNotificationStateRebroadcast.message: strahlt einen alten Stream wieder aus

cm_autoAdd.title.message: Für gespeicherte Anmeldedaten auf unterstützten Seiten werden die gefolgten Kanäle automatisch hinzugefügt
cm_autoAdd.title.description: Tooltip for the auto add button (cm_autoAdd).

channelManagerLoadError.message: Konnte "$CHANNEL$" von $TYPE$ nicht laden. Stellen Sie sicher, dass der korrekte Benutzername benutzt wird.
channelManagerLoadError.description: A network error was encountered while trying to load information on $CHANNEL$ (which can also be a user) from $TYPE$.

cm_dialog_username.description: Label for the username field in the dialog to add a channel or user

cm_dialog_user.description: Select label for adding a user

context_refresh.label.description: Refresh the status of a channel from the context menu in the panel

panel_tab_explore.description: Label of the explore tab in the panel

updateNotification.description: Notification title when a channel changes the stream title

listTooltipLive.description: Button tooltip for the panel when there are channels live

cm_dialog_title.description: Title of the dialog to add a new channel or user

cm_dialog_submit.description: Confirmation action in the dialog to add a channel or user

providernewlivestream.description: Provider name for the new livestream.com

cm_remove.title.description: Tooltip of the button to remove the selected users or channels

panel_no_results.description: The search in the explore tab of the panel held no results

panel_manage.title.message: Öffnet die Kanalverwaltung in einem Tab
panel_manage.title.description: Tooltip on the button to open the channel manager from the panel

cm_dialog_channel.description: Select label for adding a channel

context_resume.label.description: Context menu action on the refresh button in the panel to resume the queue

cm_autoAdd.description: Button to automatically add all users the user has credentials stored for

panel_loading.description: Channels are being loaded into the panel

panel_search.title.description: Tooltip on the search button in the panel

cm_secondary_label.message: Es ist schon eine Kanalverwaltung geöffnet. Es kann nur eine aufs mal genutzt werden. Wenn dies der einzige Tab mit der Kanalverwaltung ist, versuchen Sie den Tab neu zu laden.
cm_secondary_label.description: Message shown when opening a second instance of the channel manager

channelManagerGenericError.description: An unknown error was encountered while trying to fetch a channel or user.

cm_update.description: Label of the button to update the metadata of the selected users or channels

panel_tab_live.description: Label of the tab with the live channels in the panel

cm_tab_channels.description: Label of the tab that contains all channels in the channel manager

panel_nothing_live.description: Message in the live tab when no channel is live

panel_refresh.title.description: Tooltip on the refresh button in the panel

context_open.label.description: Context menu action to open the archive page of a channel in the panel

onlineNotification.description: Notification title when a channel goes live

cm_update.title.message: Aktualisiert die Eigenschafter der ausgewählten Benutzer.
cm_update.title.description: Tooltip of the button to update the metadata of the selected users or channels

cm_secondary_button.description: Button to go to the primary channel manager

context_chat.label.description: Context menu action to open the chat of a channel in the panel

cm_filter.placeholder.description: Placeholder in the filter field for the channel manager

context_add.label.description: Context menu action to add a channel from the explore tab in the context menu

cm_dialog_loading.description: Loading status indicator while adding a channel or user

panel_tab_nonlive.description: Label of the optional non-live tab in the panel

context_pause.label.description: Context menu action on the refresh button in the panel to pause the queue

offlineNotification.description: Notification title when a channel goes offline

panel_nothing.description: Message in the offline tab when there are no channels
